text: Burhan Çaçan (17 October 1960, Ağrı - 12 January 2023, Istanbul) is a Turkish singer. He first became known with his song "Neden Geldim İstanbul'a" (Why I Came to Istanbul) in 1994. He died on 12 January 2023 at the age of 62 as a result of a heart attack at his home in Istanbul.
